mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yisheng_id as yishengId ,a.yuyueneirong_text as yuyueneirongText ,a.yuyueneirong_time as yuyueneirongTime ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.yuyueguahao_yesno_types as yuyueguahaoYesnoTypes ,a.yuyueguahao_yesno_text as yuyueguahaoYesnoText ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yisheng.yisheng_uuid_number as yishengUuidNumber ,yisheng.yisheng_name as yishengName ,yisheng.yisheng_phone as yishengPhone ,yisheng.yisheng_photo as yishengPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone
FROM yuyueguahao a left JOIN yisheng yisheng ON a.yisheng_id = yisheng.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yisheng_id = #{params.yishengId} )
and a.yuyueneirong_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuyueneirongText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.yuyueneirong_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yuyueneirongTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.yuyueneirong_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yuyueneirongTimeEnd})
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.yuyueguahao_yesno_types = #{params.yuyueguahaoYesnoTypes}
and a.yuyueguahao_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuyueguahaoYesnoText},'%')
and a.yisheng_id IS NOT NULL
and yisheng.yisheng_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengUuidNumber},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengName},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengPhone},'%')
and yisheng.keshi_types = #{params.keshiTypes}
and yisheng.yisheng_zhuanchang like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengZhuanchang},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_zhicheng like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengZhicheng},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_zuozhenshijian like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengZuozhenshijian},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_new_money >= #{params.yishengNewMoneyStart}
and yisheng.yisheng_new_money <= #{params.yishengNewMoneyEnd}
and yisheng.yisheng_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_kahao like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuKahao},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_jiguan like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuJiguan},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.yonghu_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yonghuTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.yonghu_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yonghuTimeEnd})
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
